mean_en: actions or statements that trick people into believing something that is not true :deception or trickery
sentence: Look at this act of chicanery! One guy is distracting her while the other steals her purse.
sentence_trans: 看看这个诡计！一个人在分散她注意力，另一个人就去偷她的钱包。
word_etyma: chicane诡计 ＋ ry表名词 → chicanery欺骗
